text: Kampong Batang Perhentian is a village in Pengkalan Batu, a mukim in Brunei- Muara District, Brunei. The postcode for Kampong Batang Perhentian is BH1523. == Name == Kampong Batang Perhentian comes from the same name in Malay which translates as 'Batang Perhentian Village'. == References == Batang Perhentian
title: Kampong Batang Perhentian
